channel.title: Books on Josh's Desk
channel.description: These are some books on Josh's Desk

item.title: Learning the vi and Vim Editors
item.description: For nearly 30 years, vi has been the standard editor for Unix and Linux, and since 1986 this book has been the leading vi guide.

item.title: Flask Web Development: Developing Web Applications with Python
item.description: Take full creative control of your web applications with Flask, the Python-based microframework.
